meanings.definition: The act of placing plants in the ground.
meanings.sent1: The gardeners worked on the plantings in the park.
meanings.sent2: The beautiful plantings in the botanical garden attract many visitors.
meanings.sent3: The plantings in the backyard seemed to be having a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: Her love for plantings was like a colorful painting coming to life.
meanings.sent5: The fresh scent of the plantings filled the air with nature's perfume.

meanings.definition: An area where plants are growing.
meanings.sent1: The plantings near the fountain flourished in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The community garden had various plantings of fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The plantings in the forest whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The plantings in the meadow danced gracefully in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The plantings along the riverbank created a serene atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The plants themselves that have been placed in the ground.
meanings.sent1: The colorful plantings in the flower bed brightened up the yard.
meanings.sent2: The plantings in the pots needed watering to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel kept stealing from the plantings in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her favorite plantings were the ones with vibrant blooms.
meanings.sent5: The plantings in the greenhouse thrived under careful attention.
